ongoing.title: MIT Clubs
ongoing.description: Developing a web app that helps MIT students discover clubs and track recruitment deadlines. Previously, as the team lead of this project, I also managed weekly meetings, and scoped out timeline and features.

ongoing.title: MapIT
ongoing.description: Collaborating on a web app that helps MIT students navigate campus and find event locations. Previously, as the team lead of this project, I also managed weekly meetings, and scoped out timeline and features.

ongoing.title: AppDev@MIT
ongoing.description: Founded and co-led a community of 40+ students dedicated to building software at MIT.

ongoing.title: Weekend Hacking
ongoing.description: Competing in hackathons, including HackPrinceton, Hack@Brown, and JP Morgan Chase's Code For Good.

previous.title: Science Writer @ The Tech
previous.description: Covered stories about science and technology for MIT's independent student newspaper.

previous.title: Y&Z Ventures
previous.description: Designed and built a landing page for Y&Z Ventures, a Los Angeles-based fund that invests on behalf of professionals and private foundations.

previous.title: SneakIn
previous.description: As a part of AI@MIT Labs, I worked with a team to build a web app to predict prices of items in the StockX marketplace. I was responsible for training the neural network, which achieved 95% accuracy.

previous.title: Folio
previous.description: Built an iOS app that uses an LLM to help high school students build their portfolio for college applications.
